textAfterTable: 14 Songs Editors’ Notes Taking a leap of faith, Jodi King and Chris Rademaker sold their condo, left their native Winnipeg, and hit the road to musically spread the Good News. Under the moniker Love & The Outcome, this Christian husband-and-wife duo fill their songs with a sense of spiritual hope and joy. Lead singer King’s upbeat style of modern pop fuses with bassist Rademaker’s rock inclinations to produce a bright, hook-laden sound. Love & The Outcome are adept at wrapping breezy melodies around solid Scripture-based lyrics without preachiness. The first single, “He Is with Us,” embodies the duo’s appeal with its honeyed vocals, clap-along beat, and anthemic chorus. “When We Love,” “Bring Us Back," and “King of My Heart” are likewise engaging, delivering positive content matched with shimmering melodies and gliding grooves. “City of God” slows down the tempo for an inspirational message that reaches across cultural boundaries. Getting more personal, King reflects on family tragedies and ultimate redemption in “The Story You’re Building in Me,” a track with a folk-pop flavor.
